resources.string: The game begins with the dealer dealing two cards to the player. One card will be face down and one card will be face up. The player can choose to hit or stand based on the results. If the player reaches a total score of 21, he gets Blackjack and wins automatically. If the player goes above 21, he busts and loses. All face cards are worth 10 while each numbered card is worth its value on the card. If the player reaches 4 cards without busting, he wins the pot!
Created by: Thomas Gray and Alden Poole
Thomas - Information Security (Minor in Information Systems) \nAlden - Applied Computer Science (Minor in Information Systems)
